title: Accounting Specialist (Aerospace) NEW!
full_description: Job Title: Accounting SpecialistJOB DESCRIPTIONS: Ensuring payment policy and accounts payable guidelines are followedPrepare, verify and gather backup for AP invoicesInput data and review transactions for accuracy (average 150 - 250 invoices/month)Coordinate with appropriate departments to secure proper payment approvalsReconcile vendor statements, research and correct discrepancies Respond to all vendor and supply chain inquiries regarding invoicesResolve invoice discrepancies by working with supplier and/or buyer Track purchase order balances to ensure payments are not processed without PO fundsCommunicate inactive vendors with the Corporate office Provide supporting documentation for audits Oversee maintenance of accounts payable files and records Assists with preparation of 1099s Perform other related duties as assigned by management.JOB REQUIREMENTS:At least 3 - 5 years of relevant experience requiredHigh school degree requiredMicrosoft Windows experience required Knowledge of basic accounting principles as well as California labor laws and taxes preferred Accurate typing skills of 35 WPM may be required Must demonstrate effective verbal, written and interpersonal communication skills. Ability to work with others and be a participative team player
